Was that something new under 2.0? I don't remember doing that with 1.12

> =
the issue is that the default startup script only allows access from
> loca=
lhost (127.0.0.1). When you start up heritrix you need to pass
> along a "-=
-bind" option with the IP of the NIC you want to use.
